enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve checking and potentially modifying the state of the comparator, specifically whether it is locked or not.
Both methods involve adding objects to the comparator's internal map, though 'addAsEqual' specifically adds a new object as equal to an existing one.
The 'add' method's effect on the internal map can be tested by asserting the behavior of the 'compare' method, which relies on the map's state.
The 'add' method's effect on the internal state can be verified by asserting the equality of the comparator object before and after the addition.
